entries.hack_computer: You can not enter this area until the computer has been hacked.
entries.cant_get_module: You can't get the module out of the droid...
entries.cant_get_filter: It's jammed in there pretty good...
entries.card_winner: The credits have been deposited in your bank account for winning.
entries.card_tie: Your bet was returned since the game was a tie.
entries.card_loser: You lost.  Your credits are given to the winner of the game.
entries.acquired_memory: You have acquired the Droid Memory Module. Return it to Jinkins.
entries.acquired_gas: You have acquired the filtered gasses.  Return with them to Kole.
entries.all_nym_needed: You have everything you need to return to Nym.
entries.acquired_imggcu: You have acquired the IMGGCU's, you need to find the Research information.
entries.acquired_hard_drive: You have acquired the Research Information, you need to find the IMGGCU's.
entries.need_passkey: You cannot enter the Research Laboratory without the Pass Key.
entries.inventory_full_hd: You have no room in your inventory for the hard drive.
entries.inventory_full_gas: You have no room in your inventory for the gas canister.
entries.inventory_fiull_imggcu: You have no room in your inventory for the IMGGCU.
entries.ladder_to_roof_d: This is a ladder to the roof of Nym's Stronghold.
entries.hatch_to_stronghold_d: This is a hatch to the interior of Nym's Stronghold.
entries.shuttle_control_terminal_d: This is a terminal used to temporarily disengage defenses around the Stronghold to allow shuttles to land. This landing pad is usually reseved for Lok Revenant ships or personal ships owned by Nym.
entries.terminal_busy: The terminal is busy at the moment. Please wait until the landing pad is vacant.
entries.nym_themepark_chemical_deposit_d: A deposit of raw cationic chemical coagulent. This must be processed to be of any use in liquid filtration.
entries.nym_themepark_liquid_storage_d: WARNING! Contents under extreme pressure! Do not tamper!
entries.nym_themepark_flocculation_chamber_d: The treated water in the flocculation chamber must be stirred at a precise slow rate. Well-tuned motor regulators are an absolute neccessity.
entries.nym_themepark_mixing_chamber_d: Cationic chemical coagulents are mixed rapidly and uniformly with the partially treated water through dosing points.
entries.nym_themepark_sedimentation_tank_d: A sedimentation tank allows suspended particles to settle out of water as it flows slowly through the tank. Proper flow control is crucial to efficient functioning.
entries.deposit_not_sure_what_to_do: You don't know what this is for.
entries.pull_weed_not_while_mounted: You can't pull weeds while mounted.
entries.weed_not_sure_what_to_do: You aren't sure what to do with this weed...but it sure is annoying.
entries.weed_already_completed_quest: You've already completed your weeding responsibilities for now.
entries.nym_themepark_plant_type_1: A low growing, fruit bearing weed.
entries.nym_themepark_plant_type_4: A strange plant that grows yellow and bears small pods.
entries.nym_themepark_plant_type_5: A Cactus that resembles a spiney flower.
entries.nym_themepark_dumpster_d: A dumpster with a mind of its own.
entries.dispose_weed_not_while_mounted: You can't use the dumpster while mounted.
entries.dispose_weed_not_sure_what_to_do: You aren't sure what to do with this dumpster.
entries.dispose_weed_already_completed_quest: You have nothing more to feed the dumpster.
entries.dont_need_weed: You've already completed your quota for that weed type. You've been rewarded for your extra efforts.
entries.extra_credit_weeds: Thanks for picking extra weeds. I've rewarded you with a few extra credits.
